helpers.name: get_current_commit_hash
helpers.purpose: Get current Git HEAD commit hash
helpers.error_handling: Return null if not Git repository
return_statements: String commit hash or null if Git unavailable

helpers.name: detect_external_changes
helpers.purpose: Compare current Git HEAD with project.last_known_git_hash
helpers.error_handling: Return empty changes if Git unavailable

helpers.name: create_user_branch
helpers.purpose: Create work branch following aifp-{user}-{number} convention

helpers.name: get_user_name_for_branch
helpers.error_handling: Fallback to "user" if all detection fails
return_statements: Checks git config, then environment, then system user

helpers.name: list_active_branches
helpers.purpose: List all AIFP work branches from work_branches table
helpers.error_handling: Return empty array if table doesn't exist
return_statements: Array of branch objects with name, created_at, purpose

helpers.name: detect_conflicts_before_merge
helpers.purpose: FP-powered conflict analysis before merging (complex orchestrator)
helpers.error_handling: Fall back to file-level conflicts if DB query fails
return_statements: Queries project.db from both branches for FP analysis

helpers.name: merge_with_fp_intelligence
helpers.purpose: Git merge with FP-powered conflict auto-resolution (complex orchestrator)
return_statements: Auto-resolves conflicts >0.8 confidence using purity rules

helpers.name: sync_git_state
helpers.purpose: Update project.last_known_git_hash with current Git HEAD
helpers.error_handling: Log warning if Git unavailable, continue with cached
return_statements: Called after commits and during session boot

helpers.name: project_update_git_status
helpers.purpose: Update last_known_git_hash and last_git_sync in project table
return_statements: Convenience wrapper for common sync operation
